name: Santa's Trainee
description:
This very short game was made within 2 days for the "Totally Ranked Holiday Jam".

Your goal is to deliver some presents for Santa and get back to your sledge as soon as possible.

Controls:

A / W - walking

Space - jumping

LShift - open bag

left mouse - drag present

Known bugs:

Sadly there is a bug sometimes occuring which prevents you from dragging a present with your mouse click. Closing your bag and moving for less than a second should fix that problem. Hopefully it won't occur.

Anyway, I wish you much fun with the game and happy holidays!
